desc: 천계에서 내려왔다는 전설도 남아있는 매우 귀중한 물방울.

dictionary.lore: These rare drops are said to have fallen from the heavens, having been called forth by a monk's prayers. These light purple drops hold a great recovery effect, and the valuable Divine Light can be created with them and a High Cure. Rumor is that the spirit of the monk still carries them around St. Lamia.

name: 자주 물방울
